channel.title: Rearranging items problem (Silabs)
channel.description:
Okay, so once i found out about the problem with silabs i decided to do what she said and rearrange the id's. So anyway, I go into my CFG folder, and go into "Item.cfg" and i change the cooking cape ID with the new ID, and then i go to the main folder and go to item.java and change the old cape ID with the new one there also, i save both files, compile, and load up the server, but when i type the new ID it just says "cmon type it right!" anyone know if i have to edit anything else for this to be able to work or if i did anything wrong?
Thanks

item.title: Rearranging items problem (Silabs)
item.dc:creator: @MoparXXX MoparXXX
item.description:
@MoparXXX wrote:

yeah, hopefully someone can find out whats up, mine is similiar to yours (The code)

Read full topic

item.title: Rearranging items problem (Silabs)
item.dc:creator: @darkbeam_x darkbeam x
item.description:
@darkbeam_x wrote:

im getting same problem and i’ve changed it to 20000 look this is wht it is

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");

Anyone see anything wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Rearranging items problem (Silabs)
item.dc:creator: @MoparXXX MoparXXX
item.description:
@MoparXXX wrote:

Nope, I just added all that and replaced my old pickup with a new one from a tutorial, now it still doesnt work, anyone else have any ideas why?

item.title: Rearranging items problem (Silabs)
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

[quote=“MoparXXX, post:1, topic:161200”]Okay, so once i found out about the problem with silabs i decided to do what she said and rearrange the id’s. So anyway, I go into my CFG folder, and go into “Item.cfg” and i change the cooking cape ID with the new ID, and then i go to the main folder and go to item.java and change the old cape ID with the new one there also, i save both files, compile, and load up the server, but when i type the new ID it just says “cmon type it right!” anyone know if i have to edit anything else for this to be able to work or if i did anything wrong?

Thanks[/quote]

In the command, check if it says something like id <= 15000 and change it to 20000
